forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 5pm. Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 7 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun casts its gentle warmth over Downtown San Francisco, a vivid scene unfolds—a day defined by a soft, welcoming glow. The forecast promises a hint of drizzle later this evening, yet for now, the sky reveals a tapestry of blue, allowing clouds to drift languidly across the expanse. A light breeze whispers through the streets, sharpening the delightful contrast of the available warmth against the cool, crisp air. The marine layer may linger close, visible in shrouds around the iconic Golden Gate, but it seems intent on retreating, leaving a fine layer of golden light to wrap around the city.

For those venturing outdoors, layers are advisable, perhaps a light sweater over a comfortable shirt, for as the day draws to a close, the temperature will begin to drop, inviting a sense of snugness against cooler dusk breezes. This afternoon beckons one to stroll along the waterfront or find a quiet café to sip a warm drink while watching the world pass by. Whether exploring hidden alleys or visiting local art galleries, today’s charm lies in its subtlety—the beauty of a San Francisco summer day that balances sunny optimism with the possibility of nighttime drizzle, inviting all to appreciate the simple pleasures of life in the city.
